ACTIVATECOMPONENT.TITLE: Activate your ICO Wallet
ACTIVATECOMPONENT.INFO1: Wallets created during the ICO need to be activated.
ACTIVATECOMPONENT.INFO2: No private key is required for the activation process.
ACTIVATECOMPONENT.ACTIVATESUCCESS: Activation successfully broadcasted to the blockchain!
ACTIVATECOMPONENT.RETRIEVEFAIL: Could not retrieve an operation hash

BACKUPCOMPONENT.TITLE: Backup Your Wallet
BACKUPCOMPONENT.HEADING1: A wallet backup protects your tez against computer or software failure. If you lose the backup and can't access your wallet for some reasons, your tez are permanently lost!
BACKUPCOMPONENT.HEADING2: It is recommended that you store backups of both forms of your key (the Keystore file version and paper wallet version) in physically separate, offline environments.
BACKUPCOMPONENT.EXPORTFULLWALLET: 1. Export your Full Wallet to File
BACKUPCOMPONENT.EXPORTVIEWONLYWALLET: 1. Export your View-only Wallet to File
BACKUPCOMPONENT.EXPORTOBSERVERWALLET: 1. Export your Observer Wallet to File
BACKUPCOMPONENT.EXPORTLEDGERWALLET: 1. Export your Ledger Wallet to File
BACKUPCOMPONENT.INFOFULLWALLET: This wallet file will contain your private seed encrypted with your password.
BACKUPCOMPONENT.INFOVIEWONLYWALLET: This wallet file will contain your public key.
BACKUPCOMPONENT.INFOOBSERVERWALLET: This wallet file will contain your public key hash.
BACKUPCOMPONENT.INFOLEDGERWALLET: This wallet file will contain your public key and derivation path.
BACKUPCOMPONENT.INFOVIEWONLYWALLET2: This wallet file will contain your public key (Needed to create unsigned operations).
BACKUPCOMPONENT.EMPTY: Before making a backup, you will need to create or import a wallet.

BAKERYCOMPONENT.TITLE: Bakery
BAKERYCOMPONENT.HEADING: In the bakery, you can easily set different delegates for your accounts.
BAKERYCOMPONENT.INFO: Please note that you can't delegate with your identity. You need to create new accounts.
BAKERYCOMPONENT.EMPTY: If you want to set delegates for your tez, you will need to create or import a wallet.

DELEGATECOMPONENT.DELEGATIONSUCCESS: Your delegation operation has been broadcasted successfully to the network

IMPORTCOMPONENT.IMPORTHEADING: Import your previous wallet through your seed or your encrypted file. You can also import wallets with your ICO credentials.
IMPORTCOMPONENT.IMPORTINFO1: Import your wallet from an encrypted keystore file (.tez).
IMPORTCOMPONENT.IMPORTSUBTITLE2: 2. Import wallet from Seed or ICO credentials
IMPORTCOMPONENT.IMPORTINFO2: Retrieve wallet from your mnemonic words
IMPORTCOMPONENT.IMPORTINFO3: Track a wallet from its public key hash

MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.TITLE: Retrieve your Wallet
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFO: Please make sure to first activate your ICO-wallet.
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOPASSPHRASE: If your mnemonic phrase is protected with a passphrase, it needs to be entereds here
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOEMAIL: The email used during the ICO (e.g. example@email.com)
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOPASSWORD: The password you choose during the ICO.
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOPKHICO: Provide the public key hash to verify your email and password are correct
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOPKH: Provide the public key hash to verify your passphrase is correct
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOPASSWORD2: The password is used to encrypt your private key.
MNEMONICIMPORTCOMPONENT.INFOCONFIRMATION: Your wallet is now set up and ready to use.

NEWACCOUNTCOMPONENT.TITLE: Fund new account
NEWACCOUNTCOMPONENT.INFO: Your funding of a new account has been broadcasted successfully to the network
NEWACCOUNTCOMPONENT.INFOUNSIGNED: Your unsigned transaction has been created successfully

NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.TITLE: Collecting additional entropy
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.MOVEMOUSE: Please move the mouse over the screen to create extra entropy for the wallet creation.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOMOVEMOUSE: This step is optional, but will add an extra layer of randomness when generating your wallet.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOCREATENEWWALLET: When you create a new wallet, a new Tezos seed is generated. Your Tezos seed is the master key of all your wallet and any value inside it.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOBACKUP: Make sure to back it up, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe!
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOBACKUP1: **Do not lose it!** It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOBACKUP2: **Do not share it!** Your funds will be stolen if you use the seed on a malicious/phishing site.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOBACKUP3: **Make a backup!** Secure it like the millions it may be worth one day.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOVERIFYSEED: Please submit your seed words to verify you written down the words correctly.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOVERIFYSEED2: Please select the seed words in correct order to verify you written down the words correctly.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.ALERTMINIMUMCHARACTERS: There must be a minimum of 9 characters
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOPASSWORDENCRYPT: This password will encrypt your secret key.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOPASSWORD: When performing operations that need to be signed with your secret key, this password will be required.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFOWALLETREADY: Your wallet is now set up and ready to use.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.INFODOWNLOAD: Please download your Encrypted Keystore File.
NEWWALLETCOMPONENT.WORD1WORD2: word1 word2 word3 word4 word5 word6 word7 word8 word9 word10 word11 word12 word13 word14 word15 word16 word17 word18 word19 word20 word21 word22 word23 word24

OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.TITLE: Offline signing
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.MAININFO: In 3 easy steps, you can broadcast an operation to the tezos network without ever exposing your seed to an online environment. Desktop client for the offline signature can be found on our
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOSTEP1: The full wallet should be created in an offline system. Use that wallet to export a View-only wallet, which does not contain your private key. This wallet can be safely used on an online system to create unsigned operations.
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOSTEP2: From your View-only wallet, you can create and download an unsigned operation file ('.tzop'). Import this unsigned operation to your full wallet, verify its content and then enter your wallet password to sign the operation. You can download the new signed operation in another '.tzop' file.
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOSTEP3: The signed operation can now be transferred back to an online system. Verify its content and then broadcast it to the Tezos network.
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOUNSIGNEDOPERATION: You can create an unsigned operation with your view-only wallet in the
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOIMPORTUNSIGNEDOPERATION: Import or paste your unsigned operation
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOWALLETONLINE: Wallet appears to be online. Are you really sure you want to proceed with the signature process?
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFOIMPORTSIGNEDOPERATION: Import or paste your signed operation and transmit your operation to the Tezos network
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.INFODECODE: Would you like to decode the operation?
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.SIGNVERIFYTHISDATA: PLEASE VERIFY THIS DATA IS CORRECT BEFORE SIGNING IT
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.ALERTFAILEDTODECODE: FAILED TO DECODE OPERATION BYTES! YOU ARE ADVISED TO NOT PROCEED
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.BROADCASTVERIFYTHISDATA: PLEASE VERIFY THIS DATA IS CORRECT BEFORE BROADCASTING IT
OFFLINESIGNINGCOMPONENT.BROADCASTSUCCESSFUL: Operation successfully broadcasted to the network:
